post.body: Thanks for the blissdom "frame" tip. While I don't care so much for the frames, I love the garland/ornament combo!
Congrats!! When is the triathlon?
Not the best shot, but here is something to give you an idea of the new color!
RT We're doing a retweet contest soon. The 20th person wins a diamond pendant! http://tinyurl.com/6f43c7 Spread the word!
He woke up and was rearing to go! It was fun!
Unfortunately I do not have a picture...and cannot find a picture online. I am bummed - wanted to show Brad!
You will do just fine! Get a good night's sleep tomorrow before long run and be sure to hydrate. You will surprise yourself!
What side of town do you live in (if you don't mind me asking)? Family lives on NE side.
In some sick way, I want details to the potty training slip-up.
Because of our "initial test", we were automatically bumped up to Week 3. So, it's week 1, but week 3 at the same time!
Great to see you last night! So glad you guys could make it. Good times...good times.
You guys still coming tonight?
Doctor running very late today! Need to get back to wk.
Thought I would be sore from 80+ push ups last night - the start of our challenge - but surprisingly am not!
Getting prescription cough meds before this thing turns into full blown bronchitis.
Huz and I started the Push Up Challege tonight (www.hundredpushups.com) - fun, hard and a good workout! Will you take the challenge?
Learned I will need to stay late tonight in the event a client has revisions to project.
Nothing like a hot bowl of turkey chili to warm you up on a semi-chilly rainy day.
While I love the rain, is there a reason it needs to rain right in the middle of rush hour?
Huz just adjusted all of the lights, ornaments are just about done...it's finally coming together!
Going home early to get some rest. Detemined to shake possible cold.
People are REALLY getting on my nerves today!
Just made announcement at work that I am irritable (not feeling well). Does that give me excuse to act up?
Discovered home grocery delivery service - www.myproduceguy.com. Tempted to sign up...prices look good.
I would like to hire someone to decorate our tree. Pressure of NYE party is now making us question placement of every.single.ornament.
A much-needed free manicure at Evene Day Spa in Smyrna is calling my name!
Just exchanged the wrong Xmas lights for the correct one. Can't wait to finish the tree tonight!
This doctor's office is probably the most efficient office. I always like coming here.
Pacing the house, killing time before doctor's appt. I hate killing time!
Frantically trying to find something to wear to first holiday party of the year. Procrastination is my middle name....sometimes.
Tried running 3 miles on treadmill to sweat out cold, but gave up at 2.5. Better than nothing...
Did Day 2 of Wk 3 for hundredpushups.com challenge last night. HARD!! Now to the gym!
Hoping to get on the road soon and get this weekend started! Plans: movie, pushups tonight, exercise at gym tomorrow and a party tom night!
Getting ready for work gift exchange. $20 gift required. My last minute solution? A wrapped up $20 bill.
Friend/co-worker just brought newborn to office. Why oh why do I have to be sick today? Need a baby fix!
I forgot to mention. Went to the doc yesterday about cough. Diagnosis: Virus going around AND too much SEC partying. LOL!
Going to my first "Lia Sophia" jewelry party tonight. Based on a brief glance of the website, it's not my style, but worth checking out!
Just got back from party with old neighbors...sense of sadness came over us, realizing how much we miss them.
Thought we were going to a BBQ, but husband is asleep after a extremely long week.
The NYE dress has been found, bought and is getting altered!
The errand running has officially begun!
Standing in fast-moving line at USPS to ship gifts...will they arrive on time for Xmas?
It's warm and muggy in Atlanta and snowing in Portland - serious snowing. And people say global warming doesn't exist...
Planned to enjoy quiet evening at home, watch The Office, and then suddenly learned it was a repeat. Damn! Now I clean and wait for huz.
My head is spinning - more so than it was yesterday at this time. Day off tomorrow, which means only 2 more days of work in '08!
Late to dentist appt. I got up early and still couldn't get ready in time.
Walked dog tonight - first time since DST started. How could I not when it's 72 degrees out?
More xmas presents bought...now will they get there in time?
Did I have too much caffeine, or a hit of speed? I've been moving at 8,000,000 miles a minute today!
Thanks @100pushups Maybe it was a result of having quite a bit of stress I needed to release. Last set was difficult, but I felt good.
Husband and I completed Day 3 of Week 3 of @Hundredpushups.com challenge. Not as hard as Day 2!
New gym is pretty sweet - nice new equipment and people rarely there. Not bad considering it's less expensive than LA Fitness.
Loving the new visual search engine @crackedwindow sent me - www.searchme.com.
Joined a new gym this morning; although, with the way my back keeps acting up, I will not be working out for a couple more days. BOO!
I pulled something in my back Wed night. The spasms I am having are unreal - they literally take my breath away. I need drugs.
Having the cleaning people come today really motivated me. All Christmas/NYE decorations have been taken down and put away!
Tungsten is about to get his first bath of '09! Finally....6 days at daycare and he smells rotten!
Cleaning lady is coming back today to clean up the downstairs disaster. Now I guess I really do have to motivate to get stuff put away!
Received a Keurig machine for Christmas and am enjoying a hot cup of tea. Need to get motivated to start taking down the Xmas decorations.
Slowly but surely recovering from last night. 65+ people in attendance and a good time had by all based on the stories being told today.
Best party EVER.
20 more minutes and I will put THE dress on. If I didn't know any better, I would think I was getting re-married this evening.
So maybe I was more prepared than I realized. I have been twittling my thumbs for the past hour figuring out what's left to do! Sweet!
Fighting the need to get out of bed and finish up. Dog goes back to daycare today/tonight. Hope he's not getting too spoiled!
Finally seeing the light at the end of the tunnel. Incredibly long to-do list for tomorrow, but I will have helpers. Cannot wait!!!
My husband is going to kill me when he sees how much I have spent today.
Party hats and noise makers have been purchased!
The party is in just over 24 hours and we are expecting around 50 people. So much to still do!!
Listening to new Blind Pilot CD from @crackedwindow and @pdxmama. Fantastic songs! Thanks guys!
